titleStmt.title: An answer to a paper importing a petition of the Archbishop of Canterbury, and six other bishops, to His Majesty, touching their not distributing and publishing the late declaration for liberty of conscience
titleStmt.author: Care, Henry, 1646-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills, Printer to the Kings Most Excellent Majesty ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Henry Care. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
